duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quick and friendly customer service, including taking orders and processing payments efficiently.
Cleaning and maintaining the cleanliness of tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Following proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Working as part of a team to ensure continuity of service and assist with tasks.
Showing up to scheduled shifts on time and working under pressure at a fast pace.

education_certification.credential: No formal education or experience required.
